thread.title: Jerry Bost

author: Jerry Bost
title: Jerry Bost
text: Called and spoke to Erin in Customer Service. We discussed my requirements. I have a home with over 6,000sqft, monthly usage is over 4,000 kWh. We discussed several plans, did the math and in the end we found the best and cheapest plan to meet my needs. Was not a fast process and took some time and patience. Erin did a great job, professional, easy to talk to and knowledgeable. Thank you
